sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import {Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import moment from 'moment' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { MdModeEdit,MdDelete } from 'react-icons/md' const Memory = ({ memory }) => { return ( <> {memory.title} {memory.content} Creator : {memory.creator} {moment(moment.createdAt).fromNow()} ) } export default Memory
